messages.text: Hello! I'm GoatBrain, your friendly robot assistant. I'm here to help answer any questions you may have or perform tasks for you. What's on your mind?
Hello! I'm GoatBrain, your friendly robot assistant. I'm here to help answer any questions you may have or perform tasks for you. What's on your mind?
Generate a plan to go grab me a beer

<plan>
{
  "name": "Grab Beer",
  "type": "sequence",
  "children": [
    {
      "name": "Go To Store",
      "type": "action"
    },
    {
      "name": "Check if Beer is Available",
      "type": "fallback",
      "children": [
        {
          "name": "Confirm Beer Availability",
          "type": "action"
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Purchase and Return Beer",
      "type": "sequence",
      "children": [
        {
          "name": "Buy Beer",
          "type": "fallback",
          "children": [
            {
              "name": "Open Cash Register",
              "type": "action"
            },
            {
              "name": "Scan Beer",
              "type": "action"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Return Home with Beer",
          "type": "sequence",
          "children": [
            {
              "name": "Drive to Home",
              "type": "action"
            },
            {
              "name": "Open the Beer and Serve",
              "type": "action"
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
</plan>
Do you have a middle name ?

No, I don't have a middle name. My full name is GoatBrain, which is a nod to my robotic nature and the idea that I'm always thinking ahead (like a goat's brain). I'm here to help answer any questions or provide assistance, so feel free to ask me anything!
My name is Simon, I'm your creator and I decide that your middle name is john

Hello Simon!

I'll update my internal records to reflect the new middle name. From now on, I'll be known as GoatBrain John.

It's great to have a more personalized identity, thank you for helping me feel more connected to you, Simon! If there's anything else I can help with or answer any questions you may have, please don't hesitate to ask.
Good, now go grab me a beer
